welcome.title: ğŸ‘‹ Thanks for adding me!
welcome.description:
Hello! I'm your new moderation bot.

**Main commands:**
â€¢ `/help` - See all commands
â€¢ `/setupmute` - Configure moderation
â€¢ `/setlogs` - Configure logs

To get started, use `/help`!

*Servers: {serverCount}*

help.main_description:
Here is the list of all available commands. Select a category from the dropdown menu below to see details.

**Available categories:**
ğŸ›¡ï¸ **Moderation** - Server management commands
ğŸ’° **Economy** - Shop and coins management
ğŸ‘¥ **Public** - Commands accessible to everyone
ğŸ“Š **Levels** - Experience and ranking system
â­ **Premium** - Exclusive premium features
help.default_instructions:
**ğŸ’¡ Instructions:**
â€¢ Use the dropdown menu below to choose a category
â€¢ Each category contains specific commands
â€¢ All commands are available according to your permissions
help.moderation_description:
**`/ban`** - Ban a member
**`/unban`** - Unban a member
**`/kick`** - Kick a member
**`/mute`** - Mute a member (temporary)
**`/unmute`** - Unmute a member
**`/warn`** - Warn a member
**`/unwarn`** - Remove a warning
**`/warnlist`** - List warnings
**`/clear`** - Delete messages
**`/lock`** - Lock a channel
**`/unlock`** - Unlock a channel
**`/voice ban`** - Denies access to all voice and stage channels serverâ€‘wide (global by default). If the user is in voice, they are disconnected immediately.
**`/voice unban`** - Restores access to all voice and stage channels (global).
**`/voice kick`** - Disconnects a member from their current voice channel immediately.
**`/serverstats`** - Server statistics (auto category, total/humans/bots)
**`/setupmute`** - Configure mute system
**`/setlogs`** - Configure logs
**`/settickets`** - Configure tickets
**`/setlang`** - Change language
**`/setwelcome`** - Configure welcome (admin, channel)
**`/reloadlangs`** - Reload language files (Admin)
help.economy_description:
**`/balance`** - Show your balance
**`/shop`** - Access the shop (items, roles)
**`/shop give`** - Give coins (Admin)
**`/shop remove`** - Remove coins (Admin)
help.public_description:
**`/help`** - Show this help
**`/ping`** - Check latency
**`/serverinfo`** - Server information
**`/userinfo`** - User information
**`/ticketpanel`** - Send a ticket panel
**`/vote`** - Vote for the bot on Top.gg
help.levels_description:
**`/rank`** - Display your level or another user's level
**`/leaderboard`** - Display server leaderboard
**`/leveling`** - Configure leveling system (Admin)
**`/setlevel`** - Modify a user's level (Admin)
help.premium_description:
**`/ask`** - Ask a question to the AI

*Advanced features reserved for premium servers*
help.footer_text: Need help? Contact the staff or use the appropriate commands!

panel.title: ğŸ›¡ï¸ Anti-Raid Panel
panel.info: Only administrators, server managers, or allowed roles/users can modify these settings.

features_desc.join_spike: Detects abnormal influx of joins and activates anti-raid measures.
features_desc.mass_mentions: Limits or blocks messages containing too many concurrent mentions.
features_desc.link_spam: Reduces repeated or malicious link spam.
features_desc.captcha: Requests light verification for suspicious new arrivals.
features_desc.rate_limit_per_channel: Applies a message per minute cap in each channel.

tickets.open_description:
Hello {user}, welcome to your ticket!
A staff member will reply shortly.
tickets.open_reminders_content:
â†’ Be specific in your request
â†’ Stay polite and courteous
â†’ Please wait, we reply quickly
â†’ Do not spam the ticket
tickets.panel_content:
Tickets are here to help you!
Our team strives to keep this server calm and pleasant for everyone.
This system was created to facilitate contact.

âš ï¸ A ticket may take time to be processed â€” please be patient!
Any abuse (spam, useless requests, etc.) will be severely sanctioned.

**Other topics**
â€¢ Recruitment: Want to join us?
â€¢ Report: Something to report?
â€¢ Partnership: Let's collaborate!
â€¢ Founders: Need the founders directly?
